reviewText: my grandkids love to watch Barny and the rest of the cast
I bought this for my grandson and it came early ( the fact it drives my son crazy is a bonus)
I was well pleased with this DVD. It was mostly segments from other Barney DVD, but to me  was enjoyable watching. Great! Especially for those who don't own every Barny DVD out there!
My granddaughter absolutely loves Barney.  These 5 DVD's were a hit.
Son loves Barney and his adventures.
I needed a replacement. This was fine.

My grandson absolutely loves Barney.  Not so bad either, considering he has learned so much from this big purple dinosaur.  As long as you keep providing new Barney DVDs and other items, I will keep purchasing them.

This 2 Disc DVD set contains six episodes from the Barney Show. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD set:

Episodes:
1. Big as Barney
2. Separation
3. What's Your Name?
4. Differences
5. Full Team Ahead
6. Glad to Be Me

Bonus Features:
"A Friend Like You" Karaoke Music Video
"Everyone Is Special" Karaoke Music Video
"Being Together" Karaoke Music Video
"The Friendship Song" Karaoke Music Video
"Best of Friends" Karaoke Music Video

Note:  I believe the Amazon title of this DVD is incorrect.  It is listed as Most Huggable Moments "2", but there is no #2.  I believe the "2" in the Amazon title refers to the "2" Discs in the set.
